W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDEXIT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDEXIT_000_DETAIL.text: You acquired a spirit's power. Return to the Heavens and search for your next destination.

W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDEXIT_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDEXIT_100_DETAIL.text: You acquired a spirit's power. Head to the Heavens, then return to Miyako City.

W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_MOVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_MOVE_000_DETAIL.text: Time to look for a spirit's power.

W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_KIN_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_KIN_100_DETAIL.text: The spirit here seems reasonably powerful.

W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_KIN_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_KIN_200_DETAIL.text: The spirit here seems quite strong.

W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_KIN_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_KIN_300_DETAIL.text: A most powerful spirit awaits. You'd best be prepared before making your move.

W09_EVAR_MIDO_DUMMY_SQUARE_SIX_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_MIDO_DUMMY_SQUARE_SIX_000_TITLE.text: Luxury Boutique Deeps: Whatever Your Heart Desires

W09_EVAR_MIDO_DUMMY_SQUARE_SIX_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_MIDO_DUMMY_SQUARE_SIX_000_DETAI.text: A mysterious shop that will provide the buyer with whatever they desire. You sense spiritual power emanating from this place.

W09_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found a train platform on the other side of the door. Are there any spirits to be found in a city like this?
